oai_dc:dc.dc:title: English-made double-barreled shotgun
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Imported by Schneider & Co. of Memphis, Tenn. Inlaid metal 'capture plate' in stock which reads "Captured at Battle of Stones Rivers from Genl Wheeler's command Jan.1, 1863. Presented to A. I. Tait from Capt. R. R. Wagner 4th Regt. VRC [Veterans Reserve Corps] Dec. 25, 1864." Another shotgun apparently shortened and modified for cavalry use.
